title: Video Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged into an entitled DM5 account
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the selected MLB.tv button located on Scores, Home, and Team Page segments

OR

1. The user taps on a game tile in the Watch Now and Games segments in the Watch section
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be navigated to the video player of their desired game

title: Successful Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged into an entitled legacy account
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the selected MLB.tv button located on Scores, Home, and Team Page segments

OR

1. The user taps on a game tile in the Watch Now and Games segments in the Watch section
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be navigated to the video player of their desired game

AND

1. Successful playback is observed at the live point if live

OR 

1. Successfulful playback is observed at the starting point if an archive

title: Video Controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged into an entitled legacy account

AND

1. The user has launched an archive or live game
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user utilizes the player controls on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be able to successfully

- Scrub
- Play/Pause
- FF/RW
- Tap on quick-action buttons
- Maximize/Minimize
- Swipe

title: Advertisements
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged into an entitled legacy account

AND

1. The user has launched a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The game has gone into a stoppage time:

- Mid-inning or end-of-inning Ad break
- Pitching change
- Pre-game
- Post-game
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe advertisements playing in TV and stream breaks

AND

1. The user will observe the ad break ending before gameplay is resumed

AND

1. The user will observe that the ad break does not begin early before on-field gameplay has stopped.

title: Quick-Action Buttons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged into an entitled legacy account

AND

1. The user has launched a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user interacts with the video player and utilizes the quick-action buttons available
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will have the ability to:

- Turn closed-captions on or off
- Enable Data stack (Box Score & At Bat Data)
- Enable Picture-in-Picture
- Switch broadcast options (Video & Audio)
- Out-of-Town scoreboard
- Chromecast
- Volume scrubber
- Volume mute button

title: Exiting Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged into an entitled legacy account

AND

1. The user has launched a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the X button on the top-left of the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will exit out of the video player for their previously selected game

AND

1. Playback will no longer be heard while navigating the app

title: Picture-in-Picture
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged into an entitled legacy account

AND

1. The user has launched a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Picture-in-Picture button on the top-left of the video player

OR

1. Swipes up to background the MLB app
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The player will be minimized and enter into PiP mode

AND

1. The user is able to navigate through the MLB app and other apps while the mini-player plays back the game

AND

1. The user can exit or maximize the mini-player by using the buttons on the video player.

title: Gameday
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched the MLB app on an iPad

AND

1. The user is logged into an entitled legacy account

AND

1. The user has launched a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the data stack button on the bottom-right of the video player (B-left on iPhone)
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The Gameday feature will be displayed on the left-hand side of the video player

AND

1. The Gameday feature will include pitching-batter stats and recent at-bat plays to view

custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the selected MLB.tv button located on Scores, Home, and Team Page segments

OR

1. The user taps on a game tile in the Watch Now and Games segments in the Watch section
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be navigated to the video player of their desired game

title: Session ID in GAM
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

1. The user has enabled a session ID overlay on the video player during playback by holding down the broadcast button for 5-7 seconds.
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user inputs their session ID into Google Ad Manager:

https://admanager.google.com/2605#videocontent/stream_activity_monitor
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user can observe info returned by GAM including DAI session and parameter data

title: Audio EPG Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has logged into an account with Audio EPG entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Audio EPG icon (Headphones) from the top-right of the app
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The Audio EPG menu will drop down

AND

1. The user is able to view games in the past, present, and future by utilizing the < and > buttons

AND

1. The user receives successful playback of archived and live games selected

title: Successful Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has logged into an account with Audio EPG entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Audio EPG icon (Headphones) from the top-right of the app and selects a matchup
custom_expected:
THEN 

1. The user will receive playback of their selected game

AND

1. Their favorite team OR the home team feed will be prioritized

AND

1. The Spanish feed will be prioritized if the user has their device language set to Spanish

title: Feed Switching
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has logged into an account with Audio EPG entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Audio EPG icon (Headphones) from the top-right of the app
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will receive playback of their selected game

AND

1. The user can switch audio feeds by selecting an alternative audio segment

AND

1. The user will receive successful playback of the new feed selected

title: Audio Player Controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio feed and receives successful playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the player controls available on the EPG menu
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user is able to:

- FF and RW by 10 seconds
- Play and Pause the feed
- Scrub backwards and forwards
- Tap Live button if away from live point
- Change feeds
- User calendar date picker buttons

title: Background App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is listening to an audio feed in the MLB app
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user backgrounds the app and navigates to another app on their device
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will still receive audio playback without an issues 

AND

1. The audio feed does not pause or stop unless audio from another app begins playback

title: Device To Sleep
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user puts their device to sleep
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will still receive audio playback without an issues

AND

1. The audio feed does not pause or stop

title: Ad Drops
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream and has received successful playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The game goes to a commercial break whether it's between inning's or half innings
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Advertisement playback will begin

AND

1. The user will not hear any audio from the ballpark

title: Return To Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream and has received successful playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The game goes to a commercial break whether it's between innings or half innings

AND

1. Game playback is about to resume
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The commercial break will end 

AND

1. Audio playback of the game will resume without the user missing a play

title: Ad Volume
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream and has received successful playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The audio stream has entered an ad break
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The advertisement volume should not be significantly lower or louder than the game playback volume

title: Watch Now
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

1. The user has selected the Watch Now segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch Now segment
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe a Hero Game Tile, Games Carousel, Minor League Baseball carousel where applicable (Favorited Team), Featured content, and VOD content.

title: Watch Now Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

1. The user has selected the Watch Now segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the Hero Image & Tile at the top of the Watch Now segment
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user may observe:
- Live or archived games (MLB)
- SVOD content (Carded)
- SLive content (MiLB, Big Inning, High Heat)
- FLive content (Ex: WS Parade)

title: Watch Now Games Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

1. The user has selected the Watch Now segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the Games Carousel under the hero
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe:
- Today's games that are in Preview, Live, or Final
- Scores and stats within the game tile
- Deeplink into video playback (If Entitled)

title: Watch Now Mixed Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

1. The user has selected the Watch Now segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the Mixed Content Carousels under the hero
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Users observe the following carousels and more:
- Most Popular VOD
- Favorited Team's Most Popular VOD
- MLB Top Plays VOD
- Recaps VOD 
- Get Caught Up VOD
- MLB Network VOD
- Featured on MLB.tv SVOD
- MLB Documentaries SVOD

title: Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

1. The user has selected the Games segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Games tab
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Users will be able to view today's games 

AND

1. Scores and limited stats will be available

title: Games Calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

1. The user has selected the Games segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Games segment

AND

1. The user taps on the date above the game tiles
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user is able to navigate to a different date

AND

1. The game tiles listed are from the correct date

AND

1. The user is also able to change the dates on the Games EPG by tapping on the (<) or (>) buttons above the game tiles

title: Game Tile Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged into an mlb.tv account

AND

1. The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

1. The user has selected the Games segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Games segment

AND

1. The user taps on a game tile
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe successful playback of the selected game

AND

1. The user will observe a blackout message if a team is in-market

title: MLB Network Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is logged into an account with MVPD authorization linked

AND

1. The user has navigated to the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the MLB Network segment
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will receive playback of the MLB Network live stream

AND

1. The "On Now" and "Coming Up" calendar are available to view

title: Search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch tab

AND

1. The user has tapped on the Search segment
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the content available on the Search segment
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe buttons at the top bar which includes:

- Search Feature (Magnifying Glass)
- Channels Options (Squares)
- Create a Reel feature (Play Button Rectangle)

AND

1. VOD carousels that can be selected

AND

1. Category tiles that can be selected

title: Search Content Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch tab

AND

1. The user has tapped on the Search segment
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the content available on the Search segment

AND

1. The user taps on a VOD tile to launch video playback
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be navigated to the Film Room playlist player 

AND

1. Playback for the selected content will successfully begin

title: "Film Room" Search Results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the Watch tab

AND

1. The user has tapped on the Search segment
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Search feature (Magnifying glass) from the top nav options of Film Room
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user is able to search for specific keywords

AND

1. Relevant results to the user's search are generated 

AND

1. The user receives successful playback when selecting content to launch from the search results

title: Log In to Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is not logged into an entitled account

AND

1. The user is navigating the app from the
- Watch Tab
- Scores Tab
- Home Tab
- Gameday
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The User attempts to launch video playback for a game from a game tile, MLB.tv button, or Games EPG button
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe a paywall

AND

1. The user can log in with an entitled account

AND

1. The user will be sent to the Games EPG page after a successful login attempt

AND

1. The user can select the game for immediate video playback

title: Log In to Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is not logged into an entitled account

AND

1. The user is navigating the app from the
- Watch Tab
- Scores Tab
- Home Tab
- Gameday
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The User attempts to launch audio playback for a game from a game tile, Audio button, or Audio EPG button
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe a paywall

AND

1. The user can log in with an entitled account

AND

1. The user will be sent to the Audio EPG page after a successful login attempt

AND

1. The user can select the game for immediate audio playback

title: Apple TV+ Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. A game is broadcasted on Apple TV+
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the following areas:
- Games segment on Watch tab
- Watch Now segment on Watch tab
- Watch Now games carousel on Watch tab
- Scoreboard on Scores tab
- Scoreboard on Home tab
- Scoreboard on Team page
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe the Apple TV+ logo

AND

1. For non-Watch Now tiles, the Apple TV+ logo will not be displayed

AND

1. "Watch on Apple TV+" or "Live on Apple TV+" copy will be available

AND

1. The Apple TV+ logo will be displayed on the game tile and hero image on the Watch Now segment

title: Apple TV+ Blackout Messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has attempted to launch a game that is streaming on Apple TV+
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Apple TV blackout message
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The copy will read, " "

title: Apple TV+ Deeplink Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. An Apple TV+ game is live in the Apple TV app
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the game tile or mlb.tv link for an exclusive Friday Night Apple TV+ game
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be asked if they would like to leave the MLB app and navigate to Apple TV

AND

1. If yes, the user will be deeplinked to the proper MLB section of the Apple TV app

AND

1. The user can watch the MLB game on the Apple TV app without issues

title: Successful Purchase of MLB.tv Monthly or Yearly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the MLB paywall subscriptions page

AND

1. The user selects an MLB.tv Monthly or Yearly package SKU
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user proceeds through the IAP flow within the MLB iOS app
custom_expected:
THEN

1. A successful purchase message is displayed

AND

1. The user is asked if they would like to link their apple purchase to an MLB account

AND 

1. The user can skip this step, and proceed to app navigation, which includes successful game playback.

title: Successful Purchase of At Bat Monthly or Yearly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has navigated to the MLB paywall subscriptions page

AND

1. The user selects an At Bat Monthly or Yearly package SKU
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user proceeds through the IAP flow within the MLB iOS app
custom_expected:
THEN

1. A successful purchase message is displayed

AND

1. The user is asked if they would like to link their apple purchase to an MLB account

AND 

1. The user can skip this step, and proceed to app navigation, which includes successful audio playback.
